Zoos were a popular attraction for the young and old alike. Exotic animals of all kinds could be found and preserved for generations, all confined in small enough spaces.

And who should be the next subjects but the Matsuno sextuplets, along with their childhood friend Totoko.

How things had gotten to this point, Totoko and the sextuplets didn’t know. They’d been having a nice time at the Matsuno household and before they knew it, the house had been broken into and they’d been stripped, gagged, and taken off to wherever they’d been dumped out.

They hadn’t even been properly bound aside from the layers of tape that blinded them to their surroundings. Granted, on the car ride over in the hot trunk the group of seven had passed out on route and were only just stirring upon their arrival.
